content: readme.md spi.vimsort python imports module/package name. + whyspi provides easy to sort python imports module/package name.vim's built- :sort is great alphabetically sorting lines, the inevitable combination import... from... means 're gonna' a bad .installationvim-plugplug 'nkantar/spi.vim'usage" select import lines:spi
